Package org.certificateservices.custom.c2x.common.crypto

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AlgorithmIndicator
    Interface that all cryptograpic key algorithms enumerations should implement in order to be used with the CryptoManager
    CryptoManager
    Base interface for CryptoManager containing common methods for both ETSI ITS and IEEE standards.
    CryptoManagerParams
    Base interface for CryptoManagerParams used to initialize a CryptoManager library.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Algorithm
    Common enumeration of available key algorithms used by ITS and IEEE implementation.
    DefaultCryptoManager
    Default implementation of ITS CryptoManager with support for public key algorithms: ecdsa_nistp256_with_sha256 and ecies_nistp256
    DefaultCryptoManagerParams
    Configuration parameters for the DefaultCryptoManager, containing the provider to be used for underlying cryptographic operations.
    ECQVHelper  
    Mac1  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Algorithm.Encryption  
    Algorithm.Hash  
    Algorithm.Signature  
    Algorithm.Symmetric  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BadCredentialsException
    Exception thrown if supplied credentials to authenticate towards underlying hardward cryptographic was wrong.
    InvalidSignatureException
    Exception thrown by CryptoManager if a signature cannot be verified.
